SEARCH
Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model

Class DataSource

java.lang.Object
com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model.DataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoanInterface, ShowBalance
public class DataSource extends Object implements LoanInterface
This class provides a singleton instance of a database connection to the MySQL database. It implements the LoanInterface interface for accessing loan-related data.

    • insertUserAndAccount

      public int insertUserAndAccount(String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber, String pin, Date dateOfBirth, String username, String password, String iban, int type, int loanEligibility)
      Inserts a new user and a current account to the database.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The user's first name.
      lastName - The user's last name.
      email - The user's email.
      phoneNumber - The user's phone number.

    • insertLoan

      public int insertLoan(int clientId, double amount, int months, double currentPayment)
      Inserts a new loan into the database.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The loan's client's id.
      amount - The loan's amount.
      months - The loan repayment months number.
      currentPayment - The repayment amount for the first month.
      Returns:
      The loan's id, if the loan was inserted, otherwise 0.

    • insertLoan

      public int insertLoan(double amount, int months, String firstName, String lastName, String email, String phoneNumber, String pin, Date dateOfBirth, String username, String password, String iban, double emi, int loanEligibility)
      Inserts a new client, a new account and a loan into the database.
      Parameters:
      amount - The loan's amount.
      months - The loan repayment months number.
      firstName - The client's first name.
      lastName - The client's last name.
      email - The client's email.
      phoneNumber - The client's phone number.
      pin - The client's pin.
      dateOfBirth - The client's date of birth.
      username - The client's username.
      password - The client's password.
      iban - The account's iban.
      emi - The loan's repayment amount for the first month.
      loanEligibility - The client's loan eligibility.
      Returns:
      The client's id, if the client, the account and the loan were inserted, otherwise 0.

    • loanTransaction

      public boolean loanTransaction(int clientId, double remainingBalance, double currentPayment, double amount)
      Performs a transaction for the loan's installment repayment. It updates the loans table and performs a transaction between client and admin.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The client's id.
      remainingBalance - The remaining balance.
      currentPayment - The next repayment amount.
      amount - The transaction's amount.
      Returns:
      True if the transaction was performed, otherwise false.

      public boolean deleteLoanAndSetUser(int loanId)

      Parameters:
      loanId - The loan's id.
      Returns:
      True if the actions were performed, otherwise false.

      public boolean deleteUser(int id)

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user
      Returns:
